title: Snow Camping
description: Now that Maddie is 8 years old, she gets to go snow camping with her dad and older sister. Through Maddie's journal entries, readers follow Maddie through her exciting adventure and all the emotions she feels from beginning to end as she learns firsthand about camping in the snow.
highFrequencyWords: camouflage, digesting, hypothermia, quinzhee, snow dome, snowshoe hare, snowshoes, whine
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Quotation Marks                : Understand the use of quotation marks in text
awareness: Antonyms                : Understand the use of antonyms
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
